jump_scares.spoiler: The fish suddenly begins to scream as Nicole tries to touch it. ​
When Mia panically calls for Sasha in the water and turns Ben suddenly appears in front of her and shines a flashlight in her face
When Ben says “Are you kidding me” he is suddenly attacked by the shark at half the sentence. There is no build up here
When Sasha says “There is another way through” the shark suddenly appears without warning in the cone of light of the flashlight. This is accompanied by a very loud sound effect. ​
After Mia panically screams “Dad” and turns around with her flashlight in her hand, she discovers the body of the swimmer who was killed before. This is accompanied by a sound effect
Mia is suddenly grabbed by her father as she calls for the group
Directly as Grant says “I believe in you” he is suddenly attacked by the shark. This scene is similar to the heroic speech of Samuel L. Jackson in Deep Blue Sea and comes out of nowhere
After the Redlight comes on again, the shark’s teeth, accompanied by a loud bang, suddenly appear in front of the camera
As Alexa shines her lamp into the gap, the shark suddenly appears in front of her. But you can see it seconds before and there is no sound effect
Directly after Mia says “there must be another way” there is a change of cut and the shark suddenly swims towards her accompanied by a sound effect
As the group looks out the window at the sharks, Mia’s hand suddenly hits the window
After Mia has climbed on the lifeboat, Sasha is attacked by the shark as she climbs up the ladder
Mia is attacked by the shark as she swims to the group
An infected lunges out from a doorway
Guzman appears behind Angela
Edwin, now an infected, suddenly turns around and snarls
Anciana, as an infected, suddenly screams
An infected is revealed behind the door
An infected appears and attacks a soldier
A monkey appears and shrieks
The alien’s tongue comes out of its mouth and slams into the glass barrier
An alien hand grabs Dr. Gediman and pulls him into the hole
A broken hose drops down and starts hissing behind Elgyn. [Video]
An apparently dead man suddenly jumps up and yells
A Face Hugger jumps on to Ripley’s face
Purvis is suddenly shot
The alien snaps at Ripley
An alien roars from behind Call
The dying alien suddenly roars at Call once more
An alien creature screeches at Moses as he searches through the car, a couple of seconds later it leaps at his face
The alien suddenly attacks one of the policemen as he closes the van doors, a few seconds later it pounces on the other policeman
The alien appears by the door to the van
The alien lunges at the windscreen
The alien attacks Hi Hatz’ henchman as he turns around
There is a loud bang on the door
Moses looks through the peephole in the door a second time and the alien suddenly lunges at the door
The alien smashes in the recycling bin that Biggz is hiding in
The alien lunges at Biggz as he peers out of the recycling bin
The alien bangs on the lift
An alien knocks over Jerome
Jerome grabs Pest’s ankle
One of the killerbots pierces through the poster with its arm
A phone suddenly starts ringing, startling Mike
Something falls from the ceiling towards Alison
A killerbot appears right behind Alison
A screeching cat jumps out in front of Alison

movies.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

jump_scares.spoiler: America turns around and strange and Wong are standing behind her
America looks into a puddle and suddenly an eye pops out
Wanda sees a reflection of the Scarlet witch in the window
When Wong turns around a monster suddenly roars
A woman with a shield suddenly attacks Wanda coming out of the steam
A man approaches a dark hole and after a long focus on the hole Wanda suddenly pops out
As red smoke begins forming in the background there is 2 seconds of silence and then suddenly a demonic looking Wanda snaps a man’s neck
After a long focus on a door labeled “Blast door” Wanda suddenly pops out with red glowing eyes
Wanda suddenly pulls America backwards by magic force
When Christine approaches a seemingly dead evil strange his eye suddenly opens accompanied by a scare chord
After Christine opens Strange’s eye, an evil soul suddenly fly’s towards the screen
Strange’s 3rd eye suddenly opens while he screams
A monkey jumps against a cage and screeches
A pipe comes loose causing The Kid to shoot his gun
Something jumps down onto a table behind Portman and Goat
Dr. Carmack grabs Samantha while lying on the operating table
Destroyer pokes his head through a hole and is attacked by a monkey. [Video]
Portman is pulled under the water
Goat is attacked by a creature
A creature jumps out at John
Samantha runs into Duke
Mac is suddenly beheaded
A creature grabs Destroyer
A creature’s hand reaches down and grabs Portman around the face. [Video]
Several infected people suddenly rush at the remaining soldiers
For a 5 minute period, the camera switches to John’s first person POV and various creatures leap out suddenly and attack John
Sarge bursts through a glass wall behind John
In a recap of the first movie, a drowned Jason comes out of the water and grabs Alice
A cat jumps in through the window
One of the campers scares the others by disguising himself into a masked killer
A hand holding a hammer suddenly appears and hits the police officer
Mark gets hit by a machete and falls down the stairs
Jason comes up from under the sheets
Jason stands up facing Ginny
Jason’s hand breaks through the window
A pitchfork breaks through the door
Jason starts reaching into the car
Jason leaps toward her as she’s running away
Jason jumps in through the window and grabs Ginny
Eriko suddenly springs up from her sleep and gasps
The train suddenly shakes, startling the group
Kato suddenly pulls the trigger, shooting Eriko
A sword suddenly flies out of the fog and stabs Kato
A car suddenly explodes
Gantz suddenly closes its compartments with a loud mechanical noise
Several compartments suddenly come out of the sphere with a loud mechanical noise
The alien child suddenly spits a strange goo over the group
The child suddenly implodes, splattering black goo all over the room
Kishimoto suddenly tackles the alien from the side
Several compartments once again suddenly come out of Gantz
The presumably dead alien jumps back up behind Kato
The alien loudly implodes
The large statue implodes, sending rocks flying everywhere
The statue suddenly begins to move, attacking Kurono with its swords
As the statue’s reflection slowly becomes visible, it attacks, shattering the glass
The statue suddenly begins to attack at extreme speed

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning

jump_scares.spoiler: A rubber spider drops from the ceiling
Tommy turns around wearing one of his masks
Jason appears in the mirror
Eddie comes to breakfast wearing one of Tommy’s masks
A cat jumps toward the woman
A hand with a hatchet comes through the window
A corpse is thrown through the window
Frank turns around and a door window shatters
The lights suddenly come on and a man jumps out from behind a box
Frank turns to his left and sees a man running at him
Ani suddenly shoots Kate
A beaver swims past Walt
Walt suddenly surfaces in front of the boat
Kelly and Hank’s boat flips over
Hank moves a branch to reveal Hector standing behind it
The crocodile jumps out of the water and bites off a man’s head
Hank is pulled into the air by a trap
Kelly stands on a branch and a decomposing head flies out at her
The crocodile jumps up and grabs the helicopter
The crocodile surfaces beside the helicopter
The crocodile appears in front of Hank
The crocodile surfaces once more beside the helicopter
The crocodile grabs Hector
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek
Madison suddenly gasps as she sees a dead body
A shadowy figure suddenly slams the front door shut as Madison is trying to escape
Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest
Someone breaks the car’s window
Zoe lunges at Benny from outside the frame
A crossbow shot suddenly hits the hood of the car
Benny’s grandmother appears from behind a corner with a yell and swings a bat at him
During a quiet moment, Zoe suddenly opens the door in the foreground, making noise
Right as Benny attempts to take a swing, someone grabs the bat from behind
During the opening plane scene, immediately after a soldier vomits, heavy machine gun fire pierces the hull of the plane
After Boyce reaches dry land, he hears voices in the distance but is forced to duck when heavy gunfire rings out around him
Loud gunfire may startle some as one of the Americans is executed by Nazi soldiers
As the soldiers walk across a field on the way to the rendezvous point, a landmine explodes as one of the soldiers says “that way, you get a cut of the profits”
Boyce approaches a slightly ajar door to look at Chloe’s aunt. He hears a noise behind him and turns around, when he looks back a disfigured person is standing in front of the door
Chloe starts talking from behind Boyce
After the scientist and soldier leave, Boyce looks through the hole in the wall once more and this time a mutated person lunges towards the camera
As Boyce inspects the tar pit, something moves in the bag suspended above it
As Chase walks away from Wafner (who appears to be unconscious) saying “I think I’m gonna need…” he is suddenly tripped by Wafner
As Chloe talks to Paul in the tunnel, a mutated person reaches in and pulls her off screen
Ford turns around after setting the explosives and Wafner is standing directly in front of him
Wafner is suddenly shot after saying “I am a god, Corporal”
A zombie snatches away the plate that Morgan holds out
Several of the infected start attacking Morgan’s car
One of the apparently dead soldiers suddenly jumps up and bites a man
A silhouette passes by in the foreground
An infected person jumps out at Colonel Knox
One of the lab workers looks through a window in the door and an infected person suddenly appears right in front of her
A flock of birds fly out at Billy as he sees several flayed corpses hanging in the trees
Dillon almost runs into Mac
Blood splatters on Blaine’s shoulder
The Predator is suddenly caught in the net just as Dutch begins to turn back
Mac puts his hand over Dillon’s mouth
The Predator shoots a laser at Poncho from the trees
The Predator traps Dutch’s head between two spikes that come out of its arm
A zombie appears in the doorway behind Jeong
As Jeong raises his rifle to look through the scope, a group of zombies suddenly appears in the night vision
The zombie in the driver’s seat suddenly opens his eyes, accompanied by a loud noise
A car slams into the side of the truck
A young boy lying motionless on the ground suddenly jumps up and attacks a man
A bloodied hand appears on a window
Alice starts to drink from a pond when a mutant suddenly jumps out of it and attacks her
A monster breaks out from underneath some rubble
The creature pierces the roof of the truck that Alice is driving
After colliding with Alice’s car, the creature suddenly roars at Alice
There is a loud noise as Alice bangs into a metallic object
Alice is startled by a printer kicking into life
The red queen says “behind you” and Alice turns around to see a mutant running at her
An armed man pops up as Alice approaches the Umbrella Corporation motorbike
A zombie runs at Chu
A zombie rushes at Alice as she enters Dr. Isaacs’ tank
Alice shoots a flaming zombie
One of the dogs suddenly attacks Christian
Claire yells out to Alice who turns around as a zombie attacks her
The lights start to switch back on
The blades of the fan start to spin as Claire and Abigail go through it
A man falls through a trap door
A mutant rushes past the screen
Razor drops down behind Alice
One of the chained up corpses suddenly lunges at Razor as he walks past it
The mutant attacks Razor
The mutant gets up and runs away
Alice walks into a chain
The mutant drops down from the ceiling
The apparently dead creature gets up and attacks once more
Doc puts his hand on Alice’s shoulder
There is a loud (although not unexpected) explosion
A zombie attacks Dr. Isaacs
A man knocks on a car window, startling the occupant
A woman’s head suddenly explodes
A man’s head explodes
There are several loud gunshots
Mike is hit over the head with a fire extinguisher as he descends some stairs
A woman is shot in the head (followed by several more people over the next minute or so)
A man’s head explodes unexpectedly
A man is shot (somewhat unexpectedly)
A bloody woman smashes against the car window
A dog runs out of dark hole
A camouflage crawler screams at Sarah
A crawler suddenly apears next the the thermal camera
The camera pans to the left exposing a crawler
Sarah grabs Rios from behind
Dan is attacked by a crawler
A crawler appears through a hole in the rocks
A flashlight startles Cath and Greg
A human hand drops from the roof
A crawler attacks Greg
A crawler attacks Cath
Sarah touches Rios shoulder
A crawler jumps towards Vaines
A crawler jumps out from under the water
A crawler jumps out from under the water a second time
Juno comes into camera view and screams
A hand grabs Juno
Rios gets hit with a shovel
A crawler jumps out of the hole towards the camera
In a dark tunnel, a boys face suddenly appears
Dylan closes his gun safe door to reveal his wife unexpectedly standing there
A horse suddenly bolts out of it’s stall
A scary man suddenly appears in front of Dylan
As Adela pulls a lever to free a goat from it’s cage, a bar suddenly clamps down on her neck
Darius suddenly hits a ‘Rabbit Head’ man who is attacking Adela
A masked man with an axe bangs on the truck cab window
A masked man with a sledgehammer attacks Dylan
A bat skeleton suddenly falls from the ceiling right in front of Adela
A presumed to be dead body that is pinned against the wall, suddenly attacks Adela
The sound of a gun lever action is suddenly heard behind Adela
An eye suddenly opens in the socket of a Texas Longhorn skull
David attacks the security guard in the parking lot
Michael screams in horror as the brothers drop into the fog from the train bridge
The family dog attacks Michael when he enters the bathroom to kill Sam
Thor the dog lunges at Lucy
Edgar plunges a wooden spike through Marko’s heart
Paul leaps out from behind the bathroom door
Max turns around revealing he is a vampire
Grandpa drives his jeep into the house killing Max with a large wooden spike
An explosion in the sand scares rick
As Evy is searching where a sound comes from a skeleton pops up with a very loud sound effect (but it turns out to be a joke from Jonathan)
Rick throws a bag on the table scaring Evy
When Evy comes up from picking her brush, Hook from the Medjai is suddenly behind her
When Rick and the group turns around the group of Americans are pointing guns at them
A mild jump scare when Jonathan suddenly takes his hand out of his bag
When Rick and Jonathan first open Imhotep’s sarcophagus, his wet corpse pops out
When Evy reads from the book of the dead Imhotep´s corpse suddenly wakes up and lets out a roar
A shadow suddenly passes by
The ground suddenly shakes
A hand pops out of the ground
Mr. Daniels checks the window and suddenly a sandstorm blows towards him
When Rick decapitates a mummy, the mummy holds his head and Rick then slams the sword to the head causing the mummy´s head to fly towards the screen
Anck Su Namun pops up behind Rick and Evy
Evy runs into Anck Su Namuns
When Gorr is walking slowly towards the camera, he suddenly appears closer
Gorr suddenly appears in a cage where Axl tells a story to the kidnapped Asgardian children
Mark asks Emma if she is happy and then shoots himself in the head
While Emma explores the house she is startled by a picture of Bobby Ray in her photo developing room
Bobby Ray rips back the cover on the boat where he thinks Emma is hiding
As Emma tries to escape, Bobby Ray smashes the car window
Bobby Ray attempts to wrestle a weapon away from his brother, Jimmy, and accidentally slams his head into a coat rack hook on the wall
After breaking through the ice, Emma stabs Bobby Ray in the eye to release herself from his grip
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
As Norah points her flashlight in front of her, the camera scrolls to reveal a dead body right in her face
While Smith and Paul investigate the back of a dead body, something suddenly jumps out from inside the body right at the camera
Emily pokes the creature, which causes it to suddenly get up and shriek
During a quiet scene, something hits the outside of the building, making a loud noise
Paul puts his ear on a wall, followed by a loud noise that startles him
There is another banging sound that startles the crew
Something hits the outside of the building again
As the crew point a flashlight to a window in the ceiling, a bunch of tentacles suddenly smash against it
Norah points her lights in front of her, which reveals a creature who swims at the camera
One of the creatures swims right in front of Norah
One of the creatures suddenly appears behind Norah as the captain shines his light on her
As the captain looks in front of him, one of the creatures swims towards the camera
Norah shines the light on a creature that suddenly attempts to grab her
The leg of one the creatures drops down in front of Norah
Norah is suddenly grabbed in the face by one of the creatures and dragged upwards
When Eddie tries to meditate a loud noise from the neighbors bothers him
A screaming lady runs into eddie
Eddie looks in the mirror and a voice says eddie and his eyes become black
Venom suddenly says FOOD when eddie is on the phone
Eddie reacts violently when the MRI Scan starts
Another mild jumpscare when Venom suddenly says HUNGRY
Eddie is bothered by the neighbour again and when the neighbour said “whatever” Eddie suddenly roars at him with a scary face
When Dan says we don’t got a lot of time, venom suddenly grabs him by the neck
When Carlton drake says “This is the last time I’m asking you where is my symbiote,” he suddenly transforms to Riot shout WHERE IS HE

There is a sudden loud noise as Jack and Elsa “bump” into each other
Joshua comes up behind Jack and screams as he swings an axe at him
As Elsa is slowly walking towards the door, Liorn suddenly comes out and shoots an arrow at her
Jack is leaning against some bushes and a large hand grabs him
The werewolf suddenly roars and grabs Verussa
The werewolf jumps at Elsa
There is a very loud sudden cut from the protagonist staring at an animatronic, to a door opening
There is another loud and sudden cut to a fridge opening
The ostrich animatronic suddenly begins to shake violently accompanied by a sound cue
A door slams shut on its own
As the protagonist looks around a bathroom stall, an animatronic drops down from the ceiling right at the camera
As Liv is crawling around an airduct, an animatronic suddenly runs up behind her at a very quick speed
There is a cut to the siren animatronic running behind some trees accompanied by a sound cue
The siren animatronic jumps at Liv from the side
A knight animatronic suddenly stabs one of the teenagers
Kathy notes that one of the animatronics disappeared, and Bob responds “Where did it go?” after which the animatronic springs up behind them and attacks
An animatronic hand swoops down from the car window and grabs the police officer
The siren animatronic springs back to life as seen through a rear-view mirror
A police officer on a motorbike gets hit by a truck
There is a loud explosion. Several seconds later a zombie falls onto a car behind Gerry’s family
As Gerry looks down a stairwell, a zombie suddenly rushes at him. [Video
A zombie spurts into life beside a group of soldiers
A zombie runs into the gun of an armed woman
An air hostess opens a compartment in the plane and an infected man jumps out at her. [Video
As Gerry turns around, a zombie bangs on the window in front of him
